events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I would like to request a refund as the product does not meet my expectations.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back due to dissatisfaction.
The case has been assigned to agent Emily R. who handles refund requests and customer returns.
Hello! I'm Emily, and I'll assist you with your refund request today. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with the refund, please share the order number and the reason you want to return the product.
My order number is 4598123. The item looks quite different from the pictures on the website and I am not happy with the quality.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the refund process for your order 4598123. You will receive the money back within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for your quick response and assistance. I appreciate how fast you processed my refund.
The refund has been successfully processed and the case is now resolved. Please check your payment method in a few days.
We just wanted to check in to confirm you received the refund and that you are satisfied with the resolution of your issue.
As you confirmed receipt of the refund and satisfaction, we are closing your support case now. Thank you for contacting us.
